titles.title: Insurrection Act of 2025
Insurrection Act of 2025
To provide limited authority to use the Armed Forces to suppress insurrection or rebellion and quell domestic violence.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
